summary: Security posture is strong. HTTPS-only enforcement and private IP blocking are correctly implemented. One DNS rebinding limitation noted.

findings.finding: InetAddress.getByName() performs DNS resolution which could be subject to DNS rebinding. Accepted MVP limitation.
findings.suggestion: Add documentation comment noting the limitation.

findings.finding: API keys embedded as constants. Documented and accepted per Decision 10.
URL validation correctly blocks all required schemes and private IP ranges.
